experience.title: Core Contributor
achievements: Contributing to an open source mobile AI inference engine optimized for smartphones and low power devices
Implementing ARM specific SIMD kernels for matrix multiplication and attention mechanisms with KV cache quantization
Developing zero copy computation graphs for efficient on device transformer inference with sub 50ms time to first token
Building OpenAI compatible FFI APIs for cross platform SDK integration across Flutter, React Native, and Kotlin

experience.title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
achievements: Engineering a dual inference AI assistant for NASA SUITS and RASC AL challenges, integrating lightweight transformers (TinyBERT) on Jetson Orin Nano via ONNX Runtime for sub 350 ms inference, including troubleshooting deployments
Designing an edge cloud architecture that routes inference based on query complexity, latency, and network state
Implementing DSPy based orchestration and Pydantic validated NLP pipelines within Unity Inference Engine
Integrating WebSockets and Whisper based preprocessing to synchronize telemetry in high noise environments

experience.title: 2025 Cohort Founder

Offsited at Stripe Dublin and developed the mobile frontend using React Native, optimizing UI responsiveness and UX
Implemented a scalable backend with Django and PostgreSQL to manage health data, authentication, and notifications

experience.title: Associate Software Intern
achievements: Maintained CI/CD pipelines on AWS, automating deployments across 12+ microservices and improving reliability by 28%

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science; Minor in Business and Mathematics

projects.title: Machine Learning Model Serving Microservice
achievements: Developed a backend microservice to host ML models through Flask REST APIs, for model loading, inference, health checks
Handled inference requests using RabbitMQ for scalable task queuing, enabling reliable processing of high-volume workloads
Persisted model outputs and user queries in MongoDB for analytics and logging, and containerized the system using Docker

projects.title: NeRF Based 3D Modelling
projects.technologies: Neural Radiance Fields, Machine Learning, PyTorch, Computer Vision
achievements: Built an end-to-end Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) pipeline for photorealistic 3D reconstruction from multi-view images
Implemented volumetric ray marching, positional encoding, and differentiable density/color prediction for view synthesis
Designed a modular training pipeline with configurable hyperparameters to support multiple 3D reconstruction datasets
